price: Em seguida, voltaram-lhe as costas e disseram: "Ele está sendo instruído, é um louco."
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
